title.rendered: Where to Find YETI at the 2022 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo!

content.rendered:
It’s time for the Superbowl of Rodeo, the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo 2022! portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk is excited to have the inside scoop on where you’ll be able to catch YETI at this year’s NFR. This year’s event takes place December 1-10, 2022, and is sure to be one for the books!

Western Sports Foundation presented by WSM Auctioneers Athlete Lounge by YETI

Now you can enjoy the whole YETI experience in the new Western Sports Foundation Athlete Lounge By YETI. Come on in and kick back for a while when you’re doing your shopping at Cowboy Christmas. You can find the Athlete Lounge at booth 1701 on the first floor of the Convention Center. In addition, make sure to add the YETI ambassador signings to your schedule to get some autographs from your favorite YETI athletes!

  • December 6th (Tuesday) 11am-12pm | Shad Mayfield & Jordan Fabrizio Hollabaugh
  • December 8th (Thursday) 11am-12pm | The Wright Brothers
  • December 8th (Thursday) 12-1pm | Hailey Kinsel

If you’re looking to get your YETI product fix, don’t worry because there will be giveaway sign-ups for YETI products, cornhole, and great company. Cowboy Lifestyle Network can’t wait to see you there!

YETI Ambassadors Competing at the Wrangler NFR

YETI takes huge pride in the community they’ve built and continues to build. This year they have four athletes that will be competing with the infamous YETI patch on their shirts. Catch more on these athletes below and where they sit in the standings heading into the Thomas and Mack.

The Wrights

Stetson and Ryder will once again see the bright lights of Vegas. With these two competing, you will be sure to see the rest of the family as well cheering them on. Heading into the 2022 NFR, Stetson is sitting number one in the All-Around, two in the Saddle Bronc, and first in bull riding. Ryder is sitting fourth in saddle bronc. It’s going to be an interesting year to see these guys compete!

Shad Mayfield

With 2022 being his fourth trip to the NFR, Shad Mayfield is sitting at number one in the standings for Tie-down roping. The competition is steep though, with John Douch right on his heels, he could sneak in and snag the world championship for himself. Who will it be? We can’t wait to find out!

Hailey Kinsel

With three World Titles under her belt and the 2022 NFR being her sixth run at a World Title, we are excited to see Hailey and Sister back at it. Sitting at number five heading into the super bowl of rodeo, Hailey has a shot if she can win some individual rounds, but only time will tell!

The YETI Junior World Finals

The youth of rodeo is once again bringing the heat to the Las Vegas Convention inside of Cowboy Christmas. Taking place on the second level of the convention center, you can catch all of your favorite youth riders competing for a chance at more than one million combined cash and prizes! In addition to the eight standard events of rodeo, you can also enjoy the pole bending competition taking place 6-10th. The YETI Junior World Finals are essentially split in half during the week of the NFR. For the first half of the week, you can catch all of the rough stock events, with the finals taking place on December 5. Then the second half of the week will be the timed events, with the finals taking place on December 10. You can find the full schedule and learn more about tickets here.

Catch YETI at the World Series of Team Roping Finale at South Point Resort & Casino

Having been a long-time sponsor of the World Series of Team Roping (WSTR), YETI is excited once again to be a part of one of the richest events in the equine industry. Taking place at the South Point Resort and Casino, anyone can go and enjoy the event and shop at the CINCH Gift Show, also located at South Point. What’s truly astounding about this event is that it hosts over 3,000 riders and horses from all over the US, Canada, Mexico, Brazile, and many other countries as well!

Regardless of what your plans look like for the National Finals Rodeo, there is something for every kind of fan. Remember, when you choose YETI, you are choosing a company that puts its community first. That is evident in all of the events and athletes they support. From all of us here at Cowboy Lifestyle Network and YETI, we can’t wait to see you in Vegas!

Source: Krysta Paffrath | Cowboy Lifestyle Network
